case.title: Tall Single and Slim Looking to Chat and Meet with BBW (brooklyn)
case.text: I'm a 5'9" Blk man on slim side Laid back, CONFIDENT, and sincere. reply saying "Chat and Meet" so I can know what you're contacting me for. SEND A FRONT SHOT PHOTO OF YOURSELF AS WELL. PS: PLEASE do not waste your/my time if you DO NOT fit the description.
